title: BIP-1: Fix decimal error in Price Oracle for Empty Set Bitcoin
body:
Author: [Mehran Hydary](https://github.com/mehranhydary)

Discussions-To: [Empty Set Bitcoin Discord](https://discord.gg/D2VRrkrGbF)

Status: Proposed

Created: 2021-01-15

# Context

The price oracle in Empty Set Bitcoin is stored in [Oracle.sol](https://github.com/empty-set-bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/54e7470a7761b4a63b638c0ac118cfb18f2460fb/protocol/contracts/oracle/Oracle.sol#L116). 

Since the number of token decimals in Wrapped Bitcoin is different from Empty Set Bitcoin (8 versus 18) there is an error in the `updatePrice()` function in [Oracle.sol](https://github.com/empty-set-bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/54e7470a7761b4a63b638c0ac118cfb18f2460fb/protocol/contracts/oracle/Oracle.sol#L116). 

This error was spotted by the community and the community came together to propose a fix to the function so that rebasing can occur with the correct price.

The proposal decides on whether or not the Empty Set Bitcoin team should update the Oracle.sol file with the fix identified by the community or if they the team should leave things as is.

The proposed change can be found here: [https://github.com/empty-set-bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/a046625d6be4038efa6219123037a445a97c5471/protocol/contracts/oracle/Oracle.sol#L116](https://github.com/empty-set-bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/a046625d6be4038efa6219123037a445a97c5471/protocol/contracts/oracle/Oracle.sol#L116).

# Voting Signal

FOR: Update Oracle.sol file so that the Price Oracle for Empty Set Bitcoin returns the correct price for rebases.

AGAINST: Leave Oracle.sol file as is so that the Price Oracle for Empty Set Bitcoin returns the incorrect price for rebases.
